description: This experiment should show the changes in shap values as dataset size get reduced to help us understand how SHAP values change independently from an poisoning attack.  Since in Federated Learning the size is drastically reduced due to the missing step of data aggregation.

panels.description: poisoned data 1 due to a bug

targets.expr: client_accuracy{experiment_id="0", experiment_type="datasize_shap"}

panels.title: Metadata of Experiments

targets.expr: avg by (dataset_size) (client_accuracy{experiment_type="datasize_shap"})
